metadata.title: Batman wtchbatgcpd Batman GCPD Watch with Metal Band
description: The best watch for detectives in Gotham City. Feel like part of the force with these new Gotham City Police issue watches. Made from Gotham’s best metals, this is the timepiece commissioner Gordon wears on the job. He needs a dependable watch to keep the time if he ever wants to meet Batman. (Bruce is very punctual) If he doesn’t keep track of the time, he’ll usually just fall asleep at his desk waiting for it to get late enough for Bats to show up. He’s not as young as he used to be you know. But at least he always on time.
metadata.details: {"Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Item model number": "wtchbatgcpd", "Department": "Mens", "Date First Available": "December 6, 2018", "Manufacturer": "Accutime"}
